autoCommitSplitter.title: Auto Commit Splitter
noRepository: No git repository found in the current workspace.
noChanges: No changes to split (working tree is clean).
noParsableHunks: No parsable hunks found. (Binary files / renames may not be supported in MVP.)
noModels: No language models available. Install/enable a provider (e.g., GitHub Copilot Chat) and try again.
lmApiNotAvailable: Language Model API is not available in this VS Code version. Please update to VS Code 1.90.0 or newer.
selectModelPlaceholder: Choose a language model to analyze your commits
modelSelectionError: Error selecting model: {0}. Please ensure you have a language model provider installed (e.g., GitHub Copilot).
noModel: No model available. Please run "Auto Commit Splitter: Select Model" first.
selectModelTitle: Select a model for Auto Commit Splitter
planGenerated: Plan generated. Apply & create commits now?
stagedChangesError: Staged changes detected. Please commit/stash them first (MVP requires a clean index).
emptyCommitMessage: A commit has an empty message.
missingHunks: Plan did not cover all hunks. Missing: {0}
notConventionalCommit: Commit message is not Conventional Commits: "{0}"
askingModel: Asking model for a commit plan…
unmergedNotSupported: Unmerged/conflicted changes detected. Resolve conflicts first.
